html:
thou hast trusted in thy wickedness. Babylon (the wicked world) thought her way of life was sufficient to fulfill all her needs—in short, that it would save her. As Hugh Nibley wrote, "Babylon is firm in the conviction that her system is a permanent one…. In such possession of power, she can get away with anything and keep power indefinitely by crooked means, concealing her acts."

wisdom/knowledge/perverted thee. The wisdom and the knowledge that pervert are the learning and the philosophies of men, in contrast with those of God.
